bundle_format.description: Identifies this as a HashHelix bundle object.

stage.description: Engine lockdown stage for this bundle.

engine_version.description: Public engine version or Git tag.

bundle_id.description: Stable, non-PII identifier for this bundle.

engine_commit.description: Optional Git commit hash of the public engine used to produce this bundle.

lane_artifacts.description: One or more lane artifacts produced by the public HashHelix engine.

seal.description: Engine-only sealing metadata (no business logic, no vault semantics).

hash_function.description: Hash function used for the bundle hash.

canonicalization.description: Canonical JSON form used prior to hashing.

bundle_hash.description: SHA-256 digest of the canonicalized bundle body.

lanes_root.description: Optional aggregate digest or Merkle-like root over lane_artifacts.
